remarks: The partial isomorphism A for a lattice ` K ` .  (Contributed by NM, 15-Oct-2013.)
statement:
diaval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
diaval.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
diaval.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
diaval.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
diaval.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
diaval.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoA ` K ) ` W ) $.
diafval $p |- ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) -> I = ( x e. { y e. B | y .<_ W } |-> { f e. T | ( R ` f ) .<_ x } ) ) $.
$d .<_ x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d K f x y $.
$d R x $.
$d T f x $.
$d W f x y $.
$d f x y $.
